title: Tim Cook - Wikipedia
snippet: As CEO of Apple, Cook met U.S. House members on 10 December 2025 to push back against a federal legislation that could require Apple to authenticate users' ages and possibly collect sensitive data on children.

title: Tim Cook | Biography, Apple CEO, & Business Executive | Britannica Money
snippet: In November 2025, the Financial Times reported that Apple’s board had intensified its succession planning. By then, Cook had become the longest-serving CEO in Apple’s history, reflecting a tenure that reshaped the company into one of the world’s most valuable and influential companies.Erik Gregersen

title: Tim Cook - Apple
